```pddl
[
  (:action get ; Acquire an item and update its status
    :parameters (?item - object ?p - person ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?item ?loc1) (at ?p ?loc1))
    :effect (and (at ?item ?loc2) (not (at ?item ?loc1)) (acquired ?item))
  )

  (:action build
    :parameters (?entity - object ?p - person ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?entity unmade) (at ?p ?loc))
    :effect (and (at ?entity created) (not (at ?entity unmade)))
  )

  (:action keep ; Keep an entity safe or maintain a state
    :parameters (?entity - object ?actor - person ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?entity ?location) (at ?actor ?location) (not (safe ?entity)))
    :effect (and (safe ?entity) (not (unsafe ?entity)))
  )
]
```
